alert.note: Alert for Mower (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 14 at 9:47AM CST until January 16 at 12:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Bitterly Cold Early This Week... .Bitterly cold air will remain in place early this week with wind chills 20 below to 40 below zero, coldest during the nighttime and early morning hours. Limit time outdoors, if possible. ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TUESDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 10 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of north central and northeast Iowa and southeast Minnesota. * WHEN...Until noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
